titleStmt.title: The ret[ur]ne of M. Smythes enuoy ...
titleStmt.author: Gray, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted at London by Rycharde bankes, Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum. And to be sell [sic] in Lombard stret nere unto the stockes by Rycharde Kele,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
